biotools.summary:
First-order Markov modeling and discovery of monomeric and dimeric binding motifs.

MODER2 is implemented in C++ and has been tested in Linux platform. As the only external dependency, the MODER2 requires the Boost library, which is normally installed on Linux machines. Relatively recent version should be used.

bioschemas.name: MODER2
